mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_approval_doc (approval_doc_path, approval_doc_write_date, approval_doc_title, approval_doc_assist_user, approval_doc_isFinal,approval_doc_id) VALUES (#{approval_doc_path}, #{approval_doc_write_date}, #{approval_doc_title}, #{approval_doc_assist_user}, #{approval_doc_isFinal},#{approval_doc_id})
INSERT INTO tb_approval (approval_doc_idx, appr_midapprover, appr_finalapprover) VALUES (#{approval_doc_idx}, #{appr_midapprover}, #{appr_finalapprover})
mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, t.title_name, d.dept_name, e.emp_employment_status FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no

SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, t.title_name, d.dept_name, e.emp_employment_status FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no WHERE e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR t.title_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR d.dept_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
SELECT appr_line_bkmk_idx, appr_line_bkmk_name FROM tb_approval_doc_line_bkmk WHERE appr_line_bkmk_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchLine}, '%')

SELECT d.approval_doc_idx, d.approval_doc_write_date, d.approval_doc_title, d.approval_doc_id, a.appr_midapprover, a.appr_finalapprover, a.appr_mngr_updt, d.approval_doc__state, d.approval_doc_path FROM tb_approval a JOIN tb_approval_doc d ON a.approval_doc_idx = d.approval_doc_idx;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_doc_item_file (appr_file_name, appr_file_path, appr_file_type) VALUES (#{appr_file_name}, #{appr_file_path}, #{appr_file_type})
mapper.select: SELECT ad.*, a.appr_midapprover, a.appr_finalapprover FROM tb_approval_doc ad JOIN tb_approval a ON ad.approval_doc_idx = a.approval_doc_idx WHERE ad.approval_doc_id = #{loginId} OR a.appr_midapprover = ( SELECT CONCAT(e.emp_name, ' ', t.title_name) FROM employee e JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{loginId} ) OR a.appr_finalapprover = ( SELECT CONCAT(e.emp_name, ' ', t.title_name) FROM employee e JOIN title t ON e.title_no = t.title_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{loginId} )
